definition: to explain in detail/detailed answer/full solution (to a math problem)
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection

sentences.english: The space geometry experiences and observes exercise and the answer detailed explanation.
sentences.chinese: 空間幾何體練習題及答案詳解。

sentences.english: Includes both Chinese and English languages Detailed.
sentences.chinese: 包括了中文和英文兩種語言的詳解。

sentences.english: But that need find all truth and solve all truth in detail, it is too difficult.
sentences.chinese: 但是這需要發現和詳解所有的真理，這太難了。

sentences.english: The teacher gave them the answer to that question without an adequate explanation.
sentences.chinese: 老師雖然告訴大家那道題的答案，但沒有說明詳解。

sentences.english: This week we feature our 10 Most Redeeming Films of 2009.
sentences.chinese: 本週我們將詳解2009十大拯救電影。

sentences.english: He does not know, I know. To say and who may explain?
sentences.chinese: 他不懂，我知。可說與誰誰又願詳解？

sentences.english: Experts for you below prostate self massage method, sep.
sentences.chinese: 下面專家爲您詳解前列腺自我按摩方法。

sentences.english: It is even possible to use the Engineering Equation Solver EES to specify sub-problems.
sentences.chinese: 甚至可以使用工程方程求解器EES來詳解子問題。

definition: to outline/to summarize/to sketch/summary/brief description/concise narrative/in a nutshell/briefly
to talk from one's personal experience/to use oneself as an example
entrance door/to enter a door/introduction (to a subject)
(often used in book or chapter titles) general introduction/overview
move (in chess, on stage, in martial arts)/gambit/trick/scheme/movement/same as 著數|着数[zhao1 shu4]
thorough and detailed/exhaustive/the tedious details in full
